page.title: 04CLUBS IN HOLBEACH DROVE
page.content: FOR A QUIET COUNTRY LOCATION HOLBEACH DROVE RESIDENTS ARE QUITE FORTUNATE IN AS MUCH AS THEY HAVE A VERY GOOD LOCAL CLUB FOR ENTERTAINMENT. THIS IS ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF WHAPLODE DROVE THE NEXT VILLAGE. FOR A MEMBERSHIP OF TWO POUNDS PER PERSON ONE CAN JOIN FOR A YEAR AND ENJOY THE FACILITIES OFFERED. OPEN ALL NIGHTS OF THE WEEK FOR EITHER SPORTS OR JUST A DRINK THERE IS ALSO BADMINTON DARTS SKITTLES SNOOKERETTE DANCING ROLLER SKATING AND A YOUTH CLUB AVAILABLE. THE CENTRE IS CALLED THE ELIZABETHAN CENTRE BY VILLAGERS AND HAS A COMMITTEE FOR BOTH THE BAR AND THE PLAYING FIELD AND CLUB AREA. THERE IS A RECREATION AREA FOR THE CHILDREN AND A FOOTBALL PITCH.
